x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Develop a workflow to connect students and alumni for mentoring, internships, and career opportunities. ServiceNow can automate matching based on interests and skills, improving outcomes for graduates and strengthening the education ecosystem.

How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • ServiceNow Flow Designer: Automate the end-to-end workflow for alumni-student matching, event scheduling, and feedback collection.
  • ServiceNow IntegrationHub: Connect with external platforms such as LinkedIn, email, or SMS for broader outreach and communication.
  • ServiceNow Customer Service Management (CSM): Manage inquiries, support requests, and case tracking for both alumni and students.
  • ServiceNow Virtual Agent: Provide 24/7 automated assistance for frequently asked questions and scheduling.
  • ServiceNow Performance Analytics: Track KPIs, generate dashboards, and analyze engagement trends.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Secure access to the institution's alumni and student databases (with proper consent and data governance).
  • Integration with communication tools (e.g., email, SMS, calendar systems).
  • APIs or connectors for external professional networking platforms (e.g., LinkedIn).
  • Authentication mechanisms (SSO, OAuth) for user identity management.
  • Mobile/web application interface for users to update profiles, express interests, and communicate.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Data Privacy and Security: Ensuring compliance with data protection regulations when handling personal information.
  • User Engagement: Motivating both students and alumni to participate actively and regularly update their profiles.
  • Accurate Matching: Designing robust algorithms to ensure relevant and high-quality matches based on interests, skills, and availability.
  • Integration Complexity: Managing integrations with multiple external platforms and maintaining data consistency.
  • Scalability: Supporting a growing user base across different campuses or regions as the program expands.
